function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Shift in urban design towards decentralized and restructuring of public spaces due to covid-19 concerns.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Positive correlation between meteorological variables, air quality, and covid-19 cases and deaths.","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of workplace regulations and directives to mitigate covid-19 transmission among workers and visitors.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Fast transmission rates of the virus","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Mental health and physical well-being concerns for employees","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lingering persistence of the virus","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Global spread and impact of covid-19 pandemic","category":"Global risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Transmission of sars-cov-2 virus","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Risk of increased psychosocial needs due to the covid-19 pandemic","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate mental health support for patients and the public during a contagious disease outbreak","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate mental health support for healthcare providers during a contagious disease outbreak","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Overwhelmed health care systems due to stress on individual providers and general operations during a contagious disease outbreak","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Large-scale home confinement limiting direct patient encounters","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Psychosocial assessment should include covid-19-related stressors and secondary adversities","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased risk of suicidal ideation due to widening economic crisis and uncertainties","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Psychological distress due to mass home-confinement directives, including stress, depression, irritability, insomnia, fear, confusion, anger, frustration, boredom, and stigma associated with quarantine.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Intensified distress due to conflicting messages, differences among stay-at-home orders, and conflicting messages from government and public health authorities.","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Temptation to violate quarantine orders due to emotional distress and motivation to comply with quarantine.","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Uncertain prognoses and severe shortages of resources for testing and treatment","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Imposition of unfamiliar public health measures that infringe on personal freedoms","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Conflicting messages from authorities","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Physical distancing guidelines based on country may vary, leading to confusion and inconsistency in implementation.","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Challenges in maintaining physical distancing between partners and roommates in small apartments increase the risk of disease transmission.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of outdoor spaces for socialization and physical distancing","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Insufficient ventilation and indoor environmental quality","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of natural ventilation in bedrooms","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited access to restorative spaces","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate thermal comfort in living spaces","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of proper ventilation and indoor air quality in apartment housing","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate spatial variety and privacy in apartment units","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of proper separation for multi-functional spaces in apartment layouts","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate space for physical distancing in communal areas of apartment buildings","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate ventilation and daylighting in apartment units","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reliance on elevators in high-rise residential buildings","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of space for self-isolation in shared apartments","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Challenges in implementing health and safety protocols in shared apartment housing","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate affordable housing for self-isolation","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Close proximity increases the likelihood of disease transmission, especially in shared dwellings and apartment housing.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Mental and physical health issues due to poor living conditions and lack of physical distancing within shared dwellings.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased risk of surface transmission within apartment buildings due to high-touch surfaces and communal spaces.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of access to private balconies in housing for the elderly in high-rise residential buildings","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate support for physical distancing in balcony designs","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of outdoor green spaces in urban apartment buildings","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Overreliance on active heating and cooling systems","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of proper ventilation in balconies","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Uncontrolled socialization on balconies","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Unequal access to daylight, nature, and thermal comfort due to socioeconomic status","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"High co2 levels, mold, and poor indoor air quality in social housing","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Outbreak of covid-19 in a high-rise apartment building due to unknown cause","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Spread of covid-19 in areas with ideal temperature and humidity for airborne transfer","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"}]}
